member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Calendar.C1Calendar
member.summary: Represents a month calendar with the ability to interactively navigate through months and select a specific value or a range of dates.

member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the calendar's border.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Calendar.C1Calendar.DayBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used for the border between day slots.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Calendar.C1Calendar.DayBorderWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the border thickness between day slots.

member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for the day of week slots.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Calendar.C1Calendar.DayOfWeekTextColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the text displayed in the day of week slots.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Calendar.C1Calendar.DayOfWeekFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format string which is used for representing day of week names.
member.remarks:
Possible values are:
d S, M, T, W, T, F, S
dd Su, Mo, Tu, We, Th, Fr, Sa
ddd Sun, Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat
dddd Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Calendar.C1Calendar.ViewMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the calendar displays a month, year or decade view.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Calendar.C1Calendar.DisplayDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the currently displayed date of the year.
